english.segment1: Somehow I lost my way. And now it's clear to me. All that I fought so hard to keep. Is all I had to leave
english.segment2: I know you can't hear me. And you won't believe me. But there is something I must say here. Before I fade away
english.segment4: Forever we will be. Forever we will be hollow. Hollow again
english.segment5: So I'm left here waiting. So long I'm contemplating. And now I know how it is. But now it's far too late
english.segment6: How will we open the eyes of the dead. When we are hollow. Hollow
english.segment7: And all along here I was told. By fallen men in their charade. That we could find a hope inside. The safety of this empty place
